name: Durango Burrito
description: Flour tortilla loaded with shredded beef and topped with chile con queso. Served with fresh guacamole.

name: Chile Relleno
description: Chile pepper stuffed with cheese or shredded beef, then topped with ranchera sauce or chile con queso

name: Huevos Rancheros
description: Two cheese enchiladas with chile con carne topped with two eggs. Served with ranchera sauce.

name: Charro Beans
description: Pinto beans, expertly seasoned with spices, bacon and pico de gallo.

name: Carnitas Tacos
description: Marinated pork with mixed cheeses, lettuce and tomatoes, with cilantro onion relish on the side.
